Title: CWA-2024-005: Stackoverflow in wasmd
Description:
**Component:** wasmd
**Criticality:** High ([ACMv1](https://github.com/interchainio/security/blob/main/resources/CLASSIFICATION_MATRIX.md): I:Critical; L:Likely)
**Patched versions:** wasmd 0.53.0, 0.46.0

See [CWA-2024-005](https://github.com/CosmWasm/advisories/blob/main/CWAs/CWA-2024-005.md) for more details.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 0.46.0, all versions starting from 0.50.0 before 0.53.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 0.46.0 before 0.50.0, all versions starting from 0.53.0
